InstructionData.Author: Noob
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias autoic d0 alias elecic d1 alias pipeic d2
alias autopr d3 alias elecpr d4 alias pipepr d5
s autoic On 1 s elecic On 1 s pipeic On 1
main: yield
l r1 autopr Activate beq r1 1 machine1
l r2 elecpr Activate beq r1 1 machine2
l r3 pipepr Activate beq r1 1 machine3
#s autoic On r1 #s elecic On r2 #s pipeic On r1 j main
machine1: s autoic On 1
machine2: s elecic On 1
machine3: s pipeic On 1
